programme.title: The Speaker of the House
programme.short_synopsis: An overview of the position of Speaker of the House of Representatives.
programme.medium_synopsis: The various roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives, and the future of Newt Gingrich following his guilty plea to the charge of misinforming the subcommittee in 1997.
